1.「……ああ ワガハイだ。回収任務指令の| 第２９１号にて 指定された民家に 到着: Ah, it's I. We've arrived at the house|indicated in Recovery Mission Directive No.|291. We will now begin our mission.

2.「キミのことは 知っているよ。| <pc>君。それがキミの名だ。: I know who you are. <pc>. That's your|name.

3.「ワガハイを 追ってきたことも 知っている。| 先を越されるとは 思っていなかっ: We know that you have been chasing I. I didn't|think you'd beat me to it.

5.「悪く 思わないでくれたまえ。| キミに かまっている時間は ないのだよ。: Please don't take it personally. I don't have|time for you.

6.<pc>は 深い眠りに 落ちた……。: <pc> has fallen into a deep sleep...

7.どこからか 足音が 聞こえてくる……。: I can hear footsteps coming from somewhere.

8.「ほう……。もう 回復したか。| さすが <pc>君というところだな。: Well... you're back on track. That's what I'd|call <pc>.

9.「キミの用件は わかっている。| ある少年に 頼まれて| これを 届けにきたのだ: I know what you want. A boy asked you to|deliver this to him, didn't he?

10.<pc>は ふところに入れておいた|ボンドルの手紙が なくなっていることに|気が: <pc> noticed that Bondor's Letter,|which he had kept in his bookcase, was|missing!

11.「すまないが ワガハイは| 弟子は取らないと 決めているのでね。: I'm sorry, but I have decided that I, I, I, I|will not take an apprentice.

12.「この手紙の差出人には キミから| 丁重に 断っておいてくれたまえ。: Please tell the sender of this letter that you|respectfully declined to send it to me.

14.オルフェアの町にいるボンドルに|弟子入りの話が パクレ警部から|断られてしまった: Let's go tell Bondor in the Town of Orphea|that his offer of an apprenticeship has been|turned down by Inspector Pakul.

15.「おい お前。さっきも ここに 来てたが| もしや オレと同じで パクレの野郎に: Hey, you. You were here earlier, but if you're|like me, you're trying to get Pakul to pay|back his debt, right?

16.<if_woman>「あっ お姉ちゃん。| もしかして パクレ警部に 会えたのか: <if_woman>Oh, sis. Did you by any chance get to meet|Inspector Pakul?<yesno><close><else>Oh, bro. Did you by any chance get to meet|Inspector Pakul?<yesno><close><endif>

17.「……なんだ ちがうのか。| 別の用事ってんなら オレには 関係ねえな。: What, you're not? If it's something else, it's|none of my business.

18.<if_woman>「あははっ。お姉ちゃんは| ウソが ヘタクソみたいだね。<e: <if_woman>Haha. Your sister sounds like a terrible liar.<else>Haha. Your brother sounds like a terrible|liar.<endif>

19.「パクレ警部と 会ってきたって| 思いっきり カオに 書いてあるよ！: It says on the face that you met with|Inspector Pakul!

20.「どっちにしても パクレの野郎なら| 帰ってくる気配は ねえぜ。| お前も とっ: Either way, I don't see Pakul coming back. You|should get the hell out of here.

21.<if_woman>「よかった。お姉ちゃんなら| きっと 見つけてくれるって 信: <if_woman>Good. I knew your sister would find it for me!<else>Good. I knew your brother would find it for|me!<endif>

22.「……それで ボクの手紙は 渡してくれたよね。| 警部は なんて 言ってたの？: So you gave him my letter. What did the|Captain say?

23.<pc>は ボンドルに|弟子入りの話が パクレ警部から|断られてしまったことを: <pc> informed Bondor that his offer|of an apprenticeship had been turned down by|Inspector Pakul.

24.「……うわ～。| やっぱり ダメだったかあ。| そんな気は してたんだけどね。: Wow... I guess I was wrong after all. I had a|feeling that it would be.

25.「おいおい。パクレに弟子入りだと？| そんなことを 考えていたのか。| おかしな: Oh, come on. You're taking an apprenticeship|with Pakul? That's what you were thinking.|You're a funny guy.

26.「もしかして パクレの野郎に| どこかで 会ってきたってのかよ？: Did you happen to see that bastard Pakul|anywhere?

27.<if_woman>「ねえ お姉ちゃん。参考までに| パクレ警部が どこで 何を: <if_woman>Hey sis. For reference, can you tell me|everything you've seen about where Inspector|Pakul has been and what he's been doing?<else>Hey bro. For reference, can you tell me|everything you've seen about where Inspector|Pakul has been and what he's been doing?<endif>

28.<pc>は ボンドルに|パクレ警部が ジュレットの町の酒場で|しでかしたことを: <pc> told Bondor about what Inspector|Pakul had done in a tavern in Julet Town.

29.「はあ？ パクレの野郎が| ジュレットの酒場で あばれてたってか？| そいつは: What? Pakul's guy was getting ripped off at|Julet's tavern? That's new news to me.

30.<if_woman>「ふ～ん。パクレ警部が| 酒場の置き物を 壊しちゃって| お: <if_woman>Hmmm. Inspector Pakul broke the Tavern|Ornament, and your sister had to pay for it.<else>Hmmm. Inspector Pakul broke the Tavern|Ornament, and your brother had to pay for it.<endif>

31.「でも なんで そんなことに なったのかな？| 追いつめた犯人と 現場で格闘の末: But how did that happen? Maybe he got caught|up in a fisticuffs with the criminal and broke|it.

32.「それで その後 警部は どうしたのかな？: So what did the Captain do after that?

33.<pc>は ボンドルに|王都カミハルムイ南の 民家の前で|パクレ警部と会えたこと: <pc> told Bondor that he had met|Inspector Pakul in front of a private house in|Royal City Kamiharmui South.

34.「なにぃ？ あいつは今| カミハルムイに いるってのか！？| オレも 後で 行っ: What? He's in Kamiharmui now? I'll go there|later...

35.<if_woman>「……ふんふん。警部は| お姉ちゃんを 眠らせている間に|: <if_woman>...hmmm. The Captain must have entered the|house while your sister was asleep.<else>...hmmm. The Captain must have entered the|house while your brother was asleep.<endif>

36.「そして 何かを持って 出てきた……と。: And he came out with something.

37.「それ なんだろうね？| もしかして その家は 凶悪な強盗犯のアジトで| 盗まれ: I wonder what that is? Could it be that the|house was the hideout of a vicious robber who|went there to recover what was stolen?

38.「……あっ。家宅捜査ってヤツじゃないかな。| きっと 証拠品を押さえて| 強盗犯: Ah... I think it's called a raid. I'm sure|they're trying to seize evidence and catch the|robbers in the act!

39.「やっぱり パクレ警部は すごいなあ。| ますます あこがれちゃった。: Inspector Pakul is really great. I admire him|more and more.

40.「しかし よりによって カミハルムイかよ。| あの辺りには あんまり 近寄りたく: But Kamiharmui, of all places. I don't want to|go near that area...

41.<if_woman>「弟子入りを断られたのは 残念だったけど| お姉ちゃんが 行: <if_woman>I'm sorry I couldn't become your apprentice,|but thanks to my sister's visit, I learned a|lot about Inspector Pakul.<else>I'm sorry I couldn't become your apprentice,|but thanks to my brother's visit, I learned a|lot about Inspector Pakul.<endif>

42.「本当に ありがとう。| これ お礼だよ。受け取ってね！: Thank you so much. This is for you. Received!

43.「でも ボク あきらめないよ。| パクレ警部を追いかけて ぜったいに| 弟子入り: But I won't give up. I'm going after Inspector|Pakul, and I'm going to make him my|apprentice!
